roleset.name: look at closely
roleset.note: EXAMINE-V NOTES: I have the feeling an arg2 'examined for' might be necessary, butwe'll wait for an example from the corpus before including it. (from examine.01-v)
EXAMINATION-N NOTES: Based on nouns-00080. Comparison to 'examine.01'. Vn class sight-30.2, investigate-35.4. Updated by Julia (from examination.01-n)

example.name: passivized
example.text: [Valley Federal]-1 is currently being examined *trace*-1 by regulators.

example.name: active
example.text: Mr. Paul says that he has feelers out over much of the globe and that potential buyers from as far away as Japan and Italy have examined the collection.
example.arg: potential buyers from as far away as Japan and Italy

example.name: arg 1 only
example.text: After hours of meticulous examination of each address book,

example.name: both args
example.text: international examination of one of the most troubling mysteries in US - Soviet relations
example.arg: of one of the most troubling mysteries in US - Soviet relations

example.name: with args 1 and 2
example.text: The applications for such technology include examination of the body for asymmetries

roleset.name: test
roleset.note: EXAMINATION-N NOTES: Based on nouns-00080. Comparison to 'test.01'. See Vn class investigate-35.4. (from examination.02-n)

example.name: With arg 0
example.text: undergraduates taking the national university enterance examinations
